about_the_game:
Cultivate your botanical greenhouse with exotic tropical plants from across the world in this gardening game:

  • Nurture plants from spores, seeds and saplings into mighty palms, cycads, ferns and more.
  • Dazzle visitors with spectacular floral displays.
  • Create a verdant ecosystem of lush green jungle of complimentary plants.
  • Expand your greenhouse into a magnificent centre for botany and horticulture.



As the head gardener of the tropical greenhouse in a botanical garden, you are tasked with designing, planting and maintaining a climate-controlled indoor garden to showcase tropical plants from around the world. Design and build artificial beds to contain soil or other growth media for different groups of plants. Select plants that compliment each other, arrange where to plant them in your garden and avoid any plant combinations that compete with each other. Source plants from around the world to add to your garden. Grow them from seed or buy mature specimens from outside growers. Keep your plants healthy by ensuring they get the right amount of light, shade and water.



Draw visitors to your greenhouse and earn money from them by creating a varied, healthy and vibrant collection of plants. Wow and amaze them by planting flowering plants for every season of the year. Then use the money received to further expand your garden with new beds, plants and even extensions to your greenhouse.

Your palm paradise garden awaits!

------

Note: The following features are currently not planned: pruning & dwarfing, pests & diseases, cuttings & micro-propagation, weeding, hydroponics & artificial lighting, breeding, grafting & hybridisation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M @ 2.60GHz or equivalent AMD processor and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB nVidia GeForce GT460 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB nVidia GeForce GTX1070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio

short_description: Cultivate and nurture your very own world of verdant exotic plant life in this tropical greenhouse gardening game.
